-------------------------------1243477631

April, realistically, I could not do it alone, not at my age, with the  
obligations and conditions,  I have lived with, maybe a teenager could  
survive, without food and sleep 3 or 4 days, without help, but even then  they 
would look for help some where, we all need each other, this is not a  deserted 
Island, we live for our selves and for each other.sf
 
 
In a message dated 5/27/2009 9:53:26 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
april@... writes: 
 
"you could"
